ComicInfo.Summary: UNION OF THE SNAKE: Part III, Even as the Joes' world continues to crumble around them, Destro marshals the forces of Cobra, Â while the Dreadnoks embark on what seems to be a suicide mission. One which ends with a moment nobody ever thought would happen! Meanwhile, Duke, Snake-Eyes and Scarlett have become fugitives, and the man charged with their capture may be the Joes' last hope to prevent the absolute ascendance of Cobra!
ComicInfo.Title: Union of the Snake Part Three
